Had Colin Powell not stood in the way, in Donald Rumsfeld 's view, the President Bush administration might have gained conclusive evidence that Iraq had an active WMD site. As expected, shortly after Colin Powell 's speech was delivered, many of the terrorists fled Khurmal, he wrote. Mr. Watson said word of Mr. Andy Coulson 's resignation had been "sneaked out" on a busy news day when former Tony Blair was testifying before an inquiry into the Iraq war. Spin and obfuscation is all we get from Downing Street- we need to get to the truth, Mr. Watson said. For the Labour Party, Mr. Andy Coulson 's departure partly overshadowed its own woes over the departure of Mr. Johnson, a veteran Labour official and former government minister.
